pages.text: what ails you? how ye judge
will ye not be mindful
or have ye obvious authority
then bring your Book if ye do speak the truth
And they made him to be related to the ginns, while the ginns know that they shall be arraigned
celebrated be God's praises from what they attribute
save God's sincere servants
Verily, ye and what ye worship
shall not try any one concerning him
save him who shall broil in hell
there is none amongst us but has his appointed place, and
verily, we are ranged, and
verily, we celebrate His praises
And yet they say
Had we a reminder from those of yore
we should surely have been of God's sincere servants
But they misbelieved in it; but soon shall they know
But our word has been passed to our servants who were sent
that they should be helped
that, verily, our hosts should gain mastery for them
Then turn thou thy back upon them for a time
and look upon them, for soon they too shall look
Would they hasten on our torment
but when it descends in their court, ill will the morning be of those who have been warned
But turn thy back upon them for a time
and look, for soon they too shall look
Celebrated be the praises of thy Lord, the Lord of glory, above what they attribute
and peace be upon the apostles
and praise be to God, the Lord of the worlds
